description: This file defines a Qwik component for a notes management UI, including note creation, editing, deletion, and search functionalities, along with page metadata.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Main functional component defining the notes UI.

methods.name: useSignal
methods.description: Hook for creating reactive signals for UI state.

methods.name: useVisibleTask$
methods.description: Hook for side effects that run when dependencies change.

methods.name: useNotesStore
methods.description: Custom hook to access notes-related state and actions.
